segments.text: Are there any interesting articles in today ’ s newspapers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The headlines are all about the presidential election in the united states . Few other stories made the front pages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything of interest to us in the business sections ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There ’ s an interesting feature article in the chronicle about doing business in china and the daily news has printed a report about the special economic zone near pairs . We have a subsidiary company located there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Generally , the reporters take positive lines . They do point out a few problems that we need to be aware of , but there ’ s nothing worrying in the reports . In the classifieds , one of our competitors is advertising for people who speak Japanese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s interesting . They must be thinking of moving into that market . Are there any interesting editorials ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . They all seem to focus on the election . There have been several letters printed in the chronicle regarding that controversial article on drugs that they printed last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not surprised . That article certainly added fuel to the debate . Ok . Thanks . Can you leave two articles and the advertisements with me ? I ’ d like to read them .
segments.speaker: S1
